markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Limited">[Legendary Parents](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=129)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Legacy - Age of Ashes" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=270" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises](/Sources.aspx?ID=15) pg. 73</row>

</column>

One or more of your parents (either biological or adoptive) were heroes of the Age of Ashes Adventure Path. Others tend to treat you with a bit more respect, or perhaps fear your connections to people of great power.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Dexterity
or Charisma, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) skill, and the [Genealogy Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Group Coercion](/Feats.aspx?ID=788) skill feat.
name: Legendary Parents

text: Legendary Parents Source Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises pg. 73 One or more of your parents (either biological or adoptive) were heroes of the Age of Ashes Adventure Path. Others tend to treat you with a bit more respect, or perhaps fear your connections to people of great power. Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Dexterity or Charisma, and one is a free ability boost. You're trained in the Intimidation skill, and the Genealogy Lore skill. You gain the Group Coercion skill feat.
